name: Easy Apple Avocado Salad
author: Cathy Nelson Reinert
summary: This is great for a snack, a side salad. or with breakfast. Make it organic, and you're set. Holds up in the refrigerator for about a day or two at the most.
ingredients: 2  Granny Smith apples, cut into cubes
1 large avocado - peeled, pitted, and cut into chunks
1 tablespoon honey, or more to taste
1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste
directions: Combine apples and avocado together in a bowl
Whisk lemon juice and honey together in a separate bowl; drizzle over apples and avocado
Sprinkle cinnamon over salad and fold until evenly mixed
Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes
